name: RackUp!
description:
Beat your friends by showing off your highscore!

Try different speeds, go moderate, go FASTER if you dare!

Controls:

  1.   <-press to switch->
  2.   press wad to move
  3.  click on the screen to shoot bullets and destroy crates and webs
  4.   press space to choose

Guide:

Shoot out bullets to collect webs or destroy crates.

Or pick them up manually by waiting for them below them.
